# ids(descendantsOf:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the identifiers of all equipment that are descendants of the given equipment identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
func ids(descendantsOf parentID: EquipmentIdentifier) -> [EquipmentIdentifier]
```

## Parameters

- **parentID**: The equipment identifier whose descendants should be returned.

## Retrieving equipment identifiers

- **ids(childrenOf:)**: Returns the identifiers of all equipment that are children of the given equipment identifier.
- **ids(of:)**: Returns the identifiers of all equipment that conform to the given type.

items.description: Returns the identifiers of all equipment that are children of the given equipment identifier.
